original_title: How to Rid Your Lover of a Negative Emotion Caused by You!
overview: Short - Love can make us do weird things. Sadie does a weird thing. She does it to her boyfriend Dennis. Keep in mind she only wants what's best for both of them-a perfect relationship. It could be the perfect relationship, too, as long as nobody bleeds to death.  -  Sarah Allen, Joe Cobden
title: How to Rid Your Lover of a Negative Emotion Caused by You!
